website_summaries.verdict: These inexpensive fish flakes are eagerly devoured by all species of tropical fish featuring an upturned mouth, which is great considering this food’s high levels of antioxidants, prebiotics, and proteins.
pros: Fish meal is the first ingredient
Complete diet for top and mid-feeding tropical fish
cons: These tropical fish flakes are a hit with most species, but they contain artificial food colorings and wheat

customer_reviews.title: Treta Flakes
customer_reviews.text: Fish enjoy eating in the flakes, I use this and the Treta Color Min , Photo shows Brown lid online purchase and Red lid local store bought. Really great buy on line at three times as much food Brown Lid, for almost half the cost of a tiny Red Lid container Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ocfive

customer_reviews.title: Fishes love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m assuming this is flavorable because our fishes love it! Lol the flakes feel much softer and fresher than the other flakes I’ve purchased for my fishes. Was also a lot more than expected ! I have a cleaning fish. 3 angel fishes and a beta! They all love it
customer_reviews.author: Karina Baan

customer_reviews.title: Fish Love It
customer_reviews.text: Our fish love it. Holds up well in the water and does not make a mess. I have been using this product for years and found it on Amazon at a very good price. Tom
customer_reviews.author: Tom Stiles (hamrad88)

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have had a terrible experience with customer service with this company. It is clear they do not hold the health of your pet fish in high regard. As an aquarium owner of 25 years, I have bought many products from this company. This is one of the things I will no longer be purchasing from them.
customer_reviews.author: tucker77

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say about the food. It's standard food that my fish seem to enjoy. The bottle is quite a bit larger than I expected (about the size of a 40oz beer can just a little shorter). I've always used the TetraMin brand fish food, and previously used the disk-shaped pieces that supposedly decrease extra waste in the tank. I decided this was less important to me as I tend to crush the food up a bit more before I put it in the tank so the smaller fish aren't trying to eat pieces half the size of their body.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the.money, and with shelter in place I didn't have to go anywhere, it's the same stuff we buy at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: flora klucewicz

customer_reviews.title: great food for  fish
customer_reviews.text: my.fish love this food, their color has really been enhanced.will not buy any other
customer_reviews.author: rkleber58

customer_reviews.title: My fish love it.
customer_reviews.text: Big size for the money. It's nice to have it delivered & the fish are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Okera

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Best value for your money. I usually pay twice more for half the size at the pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: rawad

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: A nice big canister of food for what I consider to be a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: A Nony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Fish love this food
customer_reviews.text: Not sure but the fish adore this food. The fish give it a big floppy 5!
customer_reviews.author: Zenjon

customer_reviews.title: Great Fish Food
customer_reviews.text: Great Price! Great product! Always fresh ! Our fish love it!
customer_reviews.author: it's

customer_reviews.title: Nice big flakes
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the Large and the XL flakes, and the sizes seem about the same, but either one is fine for my big fish. So happy that TetraMin makes them!
customer_reviews.author: B. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Not large flakes
customer_reviews.text: Just FYI, the description says large flakes but they are not. It should actually say large on the product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stickney

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! They're happier and colors are so much brighter!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Fish loves them
customer_reviews.text: So far my fish loves them. I do change up his diet but other than that I think these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: I bought flakes and got flakes.
customer_reviews.text: Much larger container than I thought. Its fish flakes and the fish love them so not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: IRS fish food. Fish like
customer_reviews.text: I use this to feed regular. 49 cent goldfish and some crayfish. I added some snails and now the whole tank gets ripped up for feeding time
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Great fish food
customer_reviews.text: My fish love it, This is a really good food for them at a good price,
customer_reviews.author: Dale Willy

customer_reviews.title: My fish love it
customer_reviews.text: My tropical fish are now 8 years old and huge. I have never fed anything but tetra Min as recommended by my pet store.
customer_reviews.author: laurie mendez

customer_reviews.title: use this product all the time but pond is covered ...
customer_reviews.text: use this product all the time but pond is covered with a heater for winter feed this now only on a warm day
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnna Espeland

customer_reviews.title: GREAT seller
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Thursday and got it one day later. Super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fish don't complain
customer_reviews.text: The product is packaged well and is competitively priced. I like that I don't have to make a special trip to the fish store

customer_reviews.title: Large sturdy flakes that don't turn to powder when you pcik ...
customer_reviews.text: Large sturdy flakes that don't turn to powder when you pcik them up. All 8 kinds of my fish love it.
customer_reviews.author: Destnd

customer_reviews.title: I've been buying this product for over fifty-something years
customer_reviews.text: I love the product my fish can't wait to see me in the morning
customer_reviews.author: John stow

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my needs & good brand keep tank crystal clear , along with the filteration & weekly water changes.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian G

customer_reviews.title: Great fishfood
customer_reviews.text: Container seals tightly keeping the food fresh. Fish really seem to enjoy it. Does not cloud the aquarium even when they are occasionally overfed. Good product we have been using it for years..
customer_reviews.author: StephanM

customer_reviews.title: 👌 I love the large flakes for my fish
customer_reviews.text: 👌 I love the large flakes for my fish. They float longer and make less of a mess in the tank
customer_reviews.author: James McKinney

customer_reviews.title: beat Walmart price
customer_reviews.text: Nice to pay a ;lot less and have 2 cans, help keep the flakes fresh longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price and convenient, the Walmart near me never has that good of fish supplies available
customer_reviews.author: junior

customer_reviews.title: Flaked Fish Food
customer_reviews.text: This particular fish food is the best in that it never, ever fogs water. The fish love it of course too! When purchasing the larger can it equals into a very practical purchase in that the cost is relatively less by "more volume" sized containers.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery

customer_reviews.title: Solid As Always
customer_reviews.text: I've been using TetraMin for years. They always have a quality product, and more importantly the fish love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Big flakes Big fish...Chiclids
customer_reviews.text: Large flakes are great for medium to large African Chiclids ... they tell me they love them !
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Mirmelstein

customer_reviews.title: Fish eat it. They are still alive for months ...
customer_reviews.text: Fish eat it. They are still alive for months now. They refuse to tell me how it tastes to them, so I stopped asking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not find locally.
customer_reviews.text: I used to get this large-flake fish food at my local Wal-Mart, but they no longer seem to have it in stock. I have a few large fish, so they need large flakes. I got it cheaper on Amazon than I was paying at Wal-Mart, could order as many as I wanted and got them delivered right to my house!!! Save gas, shop Amazon!!!:)
customer_reviews.author: KJ Pfluger

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff from a long time manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Very good food I use this and a pellet food for my 20 or so chiclids they love the flake.
customer_reviews.author: BGarrett

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Tetra with my fish for years, love it and these larger flakes are easier to grab and great for larger fish!
customer_reviews.author: Skiwee

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: The guppies thrive on this food. Lasts long time for my fish.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Good fish food
customer_reviews.text: I didn't try them myself, but the fish seem to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: typical tetramin quality
customer_reviews.text: used for large angel fish, they love the large flakes
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: TetraMin Large Tropical Flakes For Top or Mid Feeders
product_meta.description:
Size:3.53-OunceTetra TetraMin Tropical Flakes are a nutritionally balanced complete diet for optimal health in top- and mid-feeding aquarium fish The world’s favorite fish food continues to be an innovation leader Today’s TetraMin has been improved with the fishkeeper’s success in mind The “Clean and Clear Water Formula” means that the flakes are even easier to digest and do not leach color thereby keeping aquarium water clean and clear TetraMin continues to be made with patented health-enhancing ProCare This precise blend of immunostimulants vitamins biotin and omega-3 fatty acids is custom designed to strengthen fish’s resistance to disease and stress TetraMin Tropical Flakes contain the Tetra Active Life Formula with antioxidants for healthy cells select proteins for growth and prebiotics for digestion Active Life Formula helps nutritionally support fish’s immune system for optimal health and long life Feed two to three times daily only as much as your fish can consume within three minutes This food will not cloud water when used as directed Since 1951 Tetra has developed the world’s most comprehensive body of fish food knowledge and fishkeeping enthusiasts have looked to the brand for products and solutions that add ease and beauty to their home Whether you're an experienced hobbyist or just starting out Tetra has everything you need – from a large variety of quality fish food and innovative equipment to test kits and decor

AMAZON.COM


QUALITY NUTRITION FOR TROPICAL FISH
Tetra has been revolutionizing and improving fish nutrition since the company’s birth in Germany in 1951. Since that time, Tetra has developed one of the most comprehensive bodies of fish food knowledge in the world. A full team of biologists, chemists, and nutritionists continually study and discover what keeps fish thriving and living long, healthy lives.

TETRAMIN TROPICAL FLAKES
Tetra’s original Tropical Fish diet, TetraMin Tropical Flakes is nutritionally balanced for optimum fish health. This formula is packed with patented ProCare that offers precise doses of select vitamins and nutrients to support immune system health, Biotin to help maintain metabolism, and Omega-3 fatty acids to provide energy and growth. TetraMin Tropical Flakes are scientifically developed to be easily digested and feature color enhancers that bring out the bright colors of your tropical fish.

CLEAN, CLEAR WATER
Tetra formulas feature micro milled, exotic, high-protein fish meal as a core ingredient—making them pure and digestible with fewer colorants. This leads to less waste and a cleaner, clearer aquarium.

PICK THE TETRAMIN THAT'S RIGHT FOR YOUR FISH
TetraMin Tropical Flakes The original Tetra diet offers optimally balanced nutrition and ProCare for added vitamins and minerals. TetraMin Select-A-Food Includes three foods in one can! TetraMin Flakes, BabyShrimp, and TetraMin Granules for a unique and varied diet. TetraMin PLUS Tropical Flakes All the vitamins, minerals, and benefits of TetraMin with the added benefit of Shrimp Flakes for maximum flavor. TetraMin Tropical Crisps Advanced technology TetraMin for reduced waste, improved tank clarity, feeding convenience, and fish appearance. TetraMin Tropical Granules A Rich Mix perfect for small community fish and mid-water feeders. Enriched with vitamin C for maximum nutrition. Also great for Bettas. TetraMin Tropical Tablets For bottom-feeding fish, this sinking tablet provides a complete and balanced diet to catfish, loaches, and other bottom-dwelling fish. Enriched with health-enhancing ProCare for maximum nutrition. WORLD CLASS MENU FOR EVERY FISH TYPE
Tetra understands that every fish is unique. For this reason, they have created a full menu of food to help meet the needs of every fish; from bottom feeders to top-feeders and small Bettas to Large Cichlids.

Flakes: Flakes make up the most popular type of fish food. Tetra flakes are formulated to keep water clean and clear and include ProCare for added health benefits.

Crisps: Tetra crisps float longer and create less waste. Crisps are ideal for small and medium-sized fish.

Granules: Bite-sized morsels sink slowly to reach all fish in your aquarium, including mid-water feeders.

Tablets: Tablets are complete, balanced nutrition that sink quickly for all bottom-feeding fish such as catfish and loaches.

Algae Wafers: Large, sinking wafers are perfect for veggie loving bottom feeders like piecostomus catfish.

Sticks: Complete and balanced sticks provide hearty nutrition to larger fish such as Oscars, Cichlids, and marine fish.

Pellets: This floating food is ideal for mid to large sized fish like Cichlids and Goldfish. Tiny pellets are available for Bettas.

Gel Foods: Innovative Grazing Blocks are great for long periods away from home. Gel Foods strive to feed fish the way they would eat in nature.

Supplements/Treats: Great in conjunction with Tetra’s Primary diets, these foods provide healthy variety for fish.
feature_bullets: TROPICAL FORMULATION Highly digestible ingredients for use as staple food for your top- and mid-feeding tropical fish
COMPLETE DIET Nutritionally balanced for optimal health
ACTIVE LIFE FORMULA With added antioxidants for healthy cells select proteins for growth and prebiotics for digestion
CLEAR-WATER FORMULA Won’t cloud water when used as directed
LESS WASTE Feed two to three times daily only as much as your fish can consume within three minutes
Included Components: Tetramin Large Tropical Flakes For Top/Mid Feeders, 3.53-Ounce

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
